testcase.name: User searches for hotels - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on homepage of Make My Trip Website...........................passed When user clicks on the hotels section......................................passed And User enters details "Delhi", "24,April 2024", "25,April 2024" & "<Rooms_Guest>".passed And click on Apply button...................................................passed And click on Search button..................................................passed Then relevant hotel options matching the search criteria are displayed......passed

testcase.name: User filter hotel search results
testcase.system-out: Given user is on homepage of Make My Trip Website...........................passed When user clicks on the hotels section......................................passed When user has preformed a hotel search......................................passed And user applies filters such as user rating, star category, property type and room amenities etc..passed Then search results are updated to reflect the applied filters..............passed

testcase.name: To verify Group Deals functionality of Hotel option
testcase.system-out: Given user is on homepage of Make My Trip Website...........................passed When user clicks on the hotels section......................................passed When user clicks on Group Deals.............................................passed And User enter details......................................................passed And click on apply..........................................................passed And click on Get Me Best Prices button......................................passed Then relevant properties with group deals are displayed.....................passed

testcase.name: To check Currency change functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user is on homepage of Make My Trip Website...........................passed When user clicks on the hotels section......................................passed When user has performed a hotel search......................................passed And User clicks on currency dropdown........................................passed And Selects the required currency...........................................passed Then The currency of the hotel price should change accordingly..............passed
